name: HYMN (ctathkren)
description:
After finishing your trials of ascension, you’re finally, finally a god.

As a newly-minted god, you’ve been tasked with something simple: keeping the world in balance. Turns out, the gods just play this rhythm game to keep things like life and death, growth and decay, yadda yadda yadda—all that—in balance. Pretty scary things to mess up, but the older gods are probably just messing with you.

After all, it’s just a rhythm game; how hard can it be?

Instructions

Use the SDF JKL keys to hit the notes as they come down.

But be careful! Make sure to keep the growth and decay at par with one another: you wouldn't want to tip the balance of the world, do you?

Keep an eye on the rabbit scale at the bottom. If one side tips too far, then it's game over (for the rest of the world, that is).

Show us your high score!

We'd love to see what scores you can reach. Because honestly? We suck at our game T^T Please let us know if you manage to see the end scene... it's super cute... maybe...

Meet: Team Beats Friday

Dani Padilla - Background Artist

Lawrence Bermudez - Programmer

Made for DevelUP Diliman's 2 Week Jam 2023, with the theme Growth/Decay.
